title.native: VTuberなんだが配信切り忘れたら伝説になってた
title.romaji: VTuber nanda ga Haishin Kiri Wasuretara Densetsu ni Natteta
title.english: VTuber Legend: How I Went Viral after Forgetting to Turn Off My Stream

description:
Yuki Tanaka is a VTuber at Live-On, one of Japan’s largest VTuber companies, as the polite and ladylike Awayuki Kokorone. One day, she forgets to end the stream, and viewers see her real personality—irreverent, improper, and prone to imbibing after a long day. Yuki is surprised to find that her accident caused her rankings to multiply, so she doubles down and gets to work. She’ll be a star yet!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.native: VTuberなんだが配信切り忘れたら伝説になってた
VTuberなんだが配信切り忘れたら伝説になってた

alternative: Heiress of the House of Gremory

name.native: アキ・ローゼンタール

node.description:
[Website](http://hitodama.info/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/hitodama1103/)

A Japanese singer, songwriter, radio personality and scriptwriter.

She has released 17 singles and 11 albums since her debut as a 13-year-old in 1994. Several of her songs have been used as anime theme songs. She is often mistaken for a voice actress because she is in the same field of activity as idol-esque voice actresses. When she is working as a screenwriter, she goes by the name Deko Akao, an alias made up from her senior [Satoru Akahori](https://anilist.co/staff/97460/)'s name.

Mother of a son and twin daughters.

A Japanese manga artist and character designer for the Shenmue series.

Miyawaki is especially fond of Xiuying Hong. He had a clear picture in his mind of her dancing in a moonlit night, that is why he made her outfit bright blue like it was reflecting the moonlight.

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/gotoujio)__

Junji Gotou is a Japanese animator and character designer, who mainly does animation direction and key animation.
A former Studio Easter employee. Debuted as an art director on [Guin Saga](https://anilist.co/anime/5041/).

__[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100003558003913)__

__Residency:__ Fujisawa, Kanagawa Prefecture, Japan
__Graduated:__ Kugenuma High School, Yoyogi Animation Academy

__Aiko Matsuyama__ is a Japanese color designer and digital painter, who mainly does finishing.
A former Studio Easter employee. Debuted as an art director on [Guin Saga](https://anilist.co/anime/5041/).
__Tomofumi Hasegawa__ is a Japanese designer, who does emblem design and monitor works.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/lvdctv) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/lvdctv/) | [Website](https://lovedesign.jp/)

Graphic designer specializing in various design works.

__Height:__ 157 cm (5'2")
__Agency:__ I'm Enterprise (2010-2022), Aoni Production (2022-present)

[Profile](https://www.aoni.co.jp/search/sakura-ayane.html) | [Blog (old)](http://www.joqr.co.jp/blog/sakura/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ayane.sakura.mg/)

__Non-anime roles:__
- Nearl - Arknights (VG)
- Yae Miko - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Yae Sakura - Honkai Impact 3rd (VG)
- Julia - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Dolla - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Devonica - Ohsama Sentai King-Ohger: Adventure Heaven (Movie)
- Rio Sonogami - Date a Live: Rio Reincarnation (VG)
- Prinz Eugen - Azur Lane (VG)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/HEYSUEZO) | [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jallenlord/)

Affiliated with [Crunchyroll](https://anilist.co/studio/6421) as an ADR Director.
